DOC.brief_title: Psychiatric Correlates Psychogenic Movement Disorder Non-Epileptic Seizure
DOC.detailed_description: Objectives The objective study ( 1 ) investigate relationship childhood abuse dissociative experience psychogenic movement disorder ( PMD ) non-epileptic seizure ( NES ) ( 2 ) investigate relationship childhood abuse PMD NES . The secondary objective study investigate measure response inhibition differ PMD subject compare normal control . This study part large study investigate psychological biological correlate conversion disorder . Study population We intend study adult patient diagnose PMD see Human Motor Control Section clinic patient diagnose NES see Epilepsy clinic normal control . Design A psychiatric assessment , measurement scale neuropsychological test administer PMD NES patient normal control . Outcome measure The first primary outcome measure comparison different subtypes childhood abuse ( measure Childhood Trauma Interview ) severity dissociation ( measure Dissociative Experiences Scale ) . The second primary outcome measure comparison frequency different subtypes childhood abuse ( measure Childhood Trauma Interview ) PMD , NES normal control group . The secondary outcome measure comparison stop-signal reaction time measure stop-signal task .
